message.entry: The ''Initial condition'' parameter ''{0}'' is infinite. Change this value to a finite number having a ''double'' type.
Parameter ''{0}'' must be set to a value of type ''double''.
Simulink detected an invalid parameter setting for block ''{0}''.
The ''{0}'' parameter is greater than or equal to the ''{1}'' parameter. A lower limit must always be strictly less than the value of the upper limit.
Parameter ''{0}'' is set to ''Not a Number (NaN)''. Change this value to a number having a ''double'' type.

The upper limit parameter ''{0}'' has a dimension {1,number,integer} that is inconsistent with the lower limit parameter ''{2}'' dimension {3,number,integer}. Change one of the parameter to a scalar or to the same dimension as the other.
